title: "Quickstart: Create ML Services cluster in Azure HDInsight using Resource Manager template"
excerpt: "In this quickstart, you use an Azure Resource Manager template to create an ML Services cluster in Azure HDInsight. Microsoft Machine Learning Server is available as a deployment option when you create HDInsight clusters in Azure. The cluster type that provides this option is called ML Services. This capability provides data scientists ..."
